name: Check list
description: Displays an interactive list of items that can be checked or unchecked. This is ideal for managing tasks where items need to be marked as selected or completed, such as to-do lists, shopping lists, packing lists, or settings preferences.
examples: What are my to-dos for today?
Show me my packing list for the trip.

component_title.description: A brief title for the entire checklist (e.g., 'Today's To-Do', 'Shopping List').

check_list.description: An array of items to be displayed in the checklist. Recommended 1-5 items.

list_subject.description: The text content for the checklist item (e.g., 'Buy milk', 'Confirm flight'). (Note: Text may be truncated with '...' if it exceeds display limits).

list_check.description: The current status of the checkbox. `true` for checked (completed), `false` for unchecked.

html: {{ data.component_title }}
